name: Solitaire Towers Tournaments
description: Do you play Classic Solitaire, Pyramid, Freecell, Mahjong, Spider, Tripeaks Solitaire or other card puzzle free games? Solitaire fans and card puzzle games fans will love the Solitaire Towers Tournaments (also known as Towers, Tri peaks, Triple Peaks or Three Peaks)! Our puzzle game is a relaxing and challenging free card solitaire with new and unique concepts of playing solitaire games! Explore the world of Solitaire Towers Tournaments, the classic card game which allows you to train your brain with hundreds of entertaining solitaire card puzzles.
